homePage.title: Tomás Gonzalez Humphreys
homePage.description: Software Engineer with experience building data-intensive and full-stack systems. I currently work at Deloitte developing internal tools that process millions of financial records using Python, SQL, and DuckDB. I also build web applications with Java (Spring Boot) and React, focusing on clean architecture, correctness, and maintainability. I am looking for a team-based job with real ownership and a focus on product.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Software Engineer with experience analyzing, developing, and validating software solutions across backend and data-intensive environments. Strong background in Python, Java, and React, with hands-on experience identifying logical errors, performance issues, and data inconsistencies. Able to clearly explain technical concepts in written Spanish and English, with a strong focus on code correctness, reliability, and structured feedback. Comfortable collaborating with non-technical stakeholders. Presented technical solutions and data outputs to regional Tax leadership at a Big Tech client, explaining data logic, validations, and results.

nextSteps.title: Next steps
nextSteps.description: I’m currently around 60% through my Computer Science Engineering degree, balancing academic challenges with real-world experience building time-saving software in my current role. I’m actively strengthening my backend skills with Java and Spring Boot, aiming to grow as a Full Stack Engineer capable of building robust and scalable systems.

jobOpportunities.title: Job Opportunities
jobOpportunities.description: For my next role, I’m especially interested in joining an engineering team where collaboration, technical discussions, and shared ownership are part of the daily work. I value environments where engineers learn from each other through reviews, design decisions, and collective problem-solving. I’m looking for remote opportunities with flexible or asynchronous schedules.

items.title: Deloitte – Financial Data Processing Platform
items.description: Internal application used to process and validate millions of financial records.

items.title: Puros Mates – Full-Stack E-commerce
items.description: Full-stack e-commerce system with REST API backend and admin panel.
Leading microservices development and database optimization.
End-to-end feature development using React and Node.js.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you’re building a product-driven team and need an engineer who can work across backend, data, and frontend, feel free to reach out.
